PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08452022-06-28,  HC,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations and the Cannabis Regulations (Supplemented Foods)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUGS REGULATIONS (SUPPLEMENTED FOODS) in order to (1) establish detailed conditions for the use of supplemental ingredients in food; (2) establish additional requirements on the labelling of supplemented foods beyond the general requirements in the Food and Drug Regulations for prepackaged foods; and (3) introduce minor consequential amendments to the CANNABIS REGULATIONS to continue to prohibit the use of foods described in Temporary Marketing Authorizations as ingredients to produce edible cannabis.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0169 Publication Date: 2022-07-20
AttachmentsAttachment
